limit.description: Enables/Disables transformation target file into base64 URIs (https://github.com/webpack-contrib/url-loader#limit).

encoding.description: Specify the encoding which the file will be in-lined with.

generator.description: Adding custom implementation for encoding files.

mimetype.description: The MIME type for the file to be transformed (https://github.com/webpack-contrib/url-loader#mimetype).

fallback.description: An alternative loader to use when a target file's size exceeds the limit set in the limit option (https://github.com/webpack-contrib/url-loader#fallback).

esModule.description: By default, url-loader generates JS modules that use the ES modules syntax.
